title: Upgrade all game graphics to AAA-level quality

requirements.text: Upgrade all visual art assets to AAA-level quality while keeping the current Pepe/toad-killer crypto meme aesthetic, including high-fidelity backgrounds, in-game sprites, and UI iconography, and ensure assets look crisp on high-DPI/retina displays.

quotes: bring all the graphics to AAA level quality

acceptanceCriteria: New high-fidelity raster assets exist under frontend/public/assets/generated using the filenames specified in this build request.
All upgraded assets render sharply (no visible pixelation) at common desktop and mobile resolutions.
No assets are served through the backend; all art is loaded from static files.
The game remains playable and performance remains stable (no obvious frame drops attributable to rendering changes).

requirements.text: Improve the in-game canvas rendering fidelity in the 2D renderer to feel 'AAA': incorporate more detailed sprite rendering for player/tokens/hazards, better composition/lighting (e.g., layered/parallax background feel, vignette/atmospheric overlay), and higher-quality particles/VFX, while honoring the existing Reduced Motion setting.

quotes: bring all the graphics to AAA level quality

acceptanceCriteria: The canvas scene (background, player, obstacles, power-ups, particles) no longer relies on simple fallback circles/glows when the new assets are available.
When Reduced Motion is enabled, any new camera/scene motion effects (e.g., shake/parallax) are disabled or substantially reduced, consistent with existing behavior.
Visual effects upgrades do not introduce gameplay logic changes (collision and scoring behavior remain unchanged).

requirements.text: Upgrade the UI presentation to AAA-level visual polish across Landing, HUD, Results, Leaderboard, Settings, and Shop screens by using higher-quality graphical elements (e.g., premium backgrounds/overlays and a cohesive custom icon set where appropriate) while keeping all existing UI flows and English user-facing text intact.

quotes: bring all the graphics to AAA level quality

acceptanceCriteria: Landing and Results screens use the upgraded high-fidelity menu background and logo assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.
HUD/Dialogs/Shop/Leaderboard maintain the same functionality and navigation, but visuals look more premium (improved iconography/visual detail) without changing feature behavior.
All user-facing text remains English (no new non-English strings introduced).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*.
Do not serve images through the backend; all graphics must be static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced from the frontend.
Respect the existing single-actor backend architecture; no backend changes are required for this graphics-only request.
nonGoals: Do not change gameplay rules, difficulty curve, scoring, progression logic, or leaderboard logic as part of this request.
Do not add third-party services or external asset hosting/CDNs.
Do not introduce new authentication methods beyond the existing Internet Identity integration.

Retheme the existing menu/results background to a Pepe/toad-killer crypto meme aesthetic (menu-background.dim_1920x1080.png > menu-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
Increase detail/texture and add premium lighting/shading while keeping the same composition (ingame-background.dim_1920x1080.png > ingame-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
Increase detail/texture and add premium lighting/shading while keeping the same silhouette readability (token-icon.dim_256x256.png > token-icon.dim_256x256.png)
